verses.name: Jonah 2:5
verses.text: The waters compassed me about, even to the soul: the depth closed me round about, the weeds were wrapped about my head.

verses.name: Jonah 2:6
verses.text: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars was about me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O Lord my God.

verses.name: Jonah 2:7
verses.text: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the Lord: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.

verses.name: Jonah 2:8
verses.text: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.
